title: France panorama. [No. 70/30]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Bastille Day - includes the traditional street-dances and fireworks display and the morning parade on the Champs-Elysees. 2. Throwback to the mad twenties - a famous musical comedy makes a come-back. 3. Today’s newspaperwomen - Francoise Giroud, reporter, editor and editorialist…a woman who works 12 hours a day in the fever of the news-room as managing-director of the weekly EXPRESS. 4. Roger Pierre and Jean-Marc Thibault - the best French comedy duo in a new skit.
